page.title: 05CHILDRENS' GAMES
page.content: {Tig Games} -games where you have to run away from the person who is 'on'. When you are caught you have to chase the others.Many variations e.g.Line Tig where you can only run along the netball pitch lines,Hospital Tig where if you are caught you chase the others holding the place where you were touched. {British Bulldogs} -a dangerous game that is often banned when a lot of children are playing.2 dens,1 each side of the playground.1 person is on.The others run from 1 den to the other, trying not to be tug.If you are caught you join the person in the middle. {Conkers} -children thread Horse Chestnuts on string and bang them together.The conker that stays whole wins. Other games -{Hopscotch,Chinese Whispers,Cat & Mouse} and ball games.
